Name: Made to be Crushed
About the game: Use the map as a weapon and don't lose your focus! Made to be Crushed is a strategic and nervous local multiplayer shooter . Trap or be trapped! Up to 4 players in local multiplayer ! Carefully designed maps for great replayability! A training mode to play alone or in co-op against bots! A strategic game with simple rules and easy to learn! Configurable keyboard and joysticks!
